title: this game is ridiculous
body: 3/4 games today i have had a dc or afk on my team and to make it even worse it was ranked and now im fucking silver 2 again after i worked so hard to get to silver 1, why cant you implement a loss prevention or something? is it that fucking hard like seriously wtf its fucking bullshit

replies.body: Can't vote on that as they are not but yes they do need a loss prevention so you only lose 1-10ip if you get a dc and the dc loses 20-30ip the winners would get 1-10ip

"Oh %%%%, we're going to lose, I'm going to flame someone to make them leave so I get loss prevented"

And why punish the winning side, what the hell is that? They didn't do anything wrong except likely kicking your ass.

this ^
'oh ♥♥♥♥, we're going to lose, might as well dc or flame my teammates until they do and get loss prevented'

Just report AFK and dc and move on.  It would be extremely difficult to devise a way to tackle these in game rage quits without the system easily being abused.
Your fault, when you get in a ranked game you should make sure you don't have to do anything for at least 40 minutes.

Except the amount of times that people on the enemy team have HONORED the afk'er on my team for "Freelo"

I could just smurf and duo with my missus and AFK every time we are about to lose so she doesn't get demoted.

It won't happen.

Anyone that actively clicks 'Exit Game' should be instantly demoted or put into a low priority ranked queue with people that have done the same.
This should not but COULD count for DC's of course.
Which would also lead to people being more careful about joining a ranked game when they have a bad connection or their little bro is home streaming porn, lagging him out.
The other poor players with the afk should lose little to no LP, and the winning team should still receive the same amount of LP they would have gotten anyway.

BUT! 

Like it matters...

You'll hit promo's for Gold V and only get wiped by some Yasuo with a 1/100 win ratio, that some how starts playing at a Diamond level in your promo.

Boosters, keeping you in Elo hell since forever.
I love how people always act like they've never recieved ez LP from someone the enemy team trolling/afking. It works both ways so don't complain.

Yeah i had 3 games in a row yesterday with Toxic/Ragers/AFKs but i didnt care.
One of them was having a bad day and his team was berating him about his pick. He yelled alot in ALL Chat and whinged a tonne.
Second one was just bad and fed uncontrollably and AFK'd 2 times in one game. Just flamed all game, i told him after the game to pull his head in and his reply to everything was 'stfu' likes some 12 year old who he probably was.
Third game i had large ping spikes from outta no where, and so was my top laner. It was GG before that anyway cause my adc decided to fight stupidly.
one game i had a duo mid ori and zed, the ori didnt connect and another was a udyr rage quit and the other one was the supp lulu kept dcing so i think it was rage worthy

Loss Prevented is ONLY for major SEVER WIDE issues.
The people that DCed and AFKed in your matches have already been automatically punished by leaver buster, if it was their first time they will be placed in an additional queue that takes 30 minutes extra to find a match. And that's just the first time punishment.
